definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: meaning and √ dub. (K:§ 62 Buhl:14);—‖[[בַּיְתָא ]] Ezr 5:3, Ezr 5:8; most wall (SyrVer Vulgate walls); M:55* cp. As. ašurrû, wall, but?; Hpt in Gu:Ezr:pp. 34. 63 thinks = [aširânâ] fr. As. ašru, sanctuary; pointed by Mas. as if = [[אֻשַּׁיָא]] (Ezr 4:12, Ezr 5:16); other conj. Marquart:44 Scheft:79 f.
